mapper.select: SELECT t_wages.wages_id, t_wages.basic_salary, t_wages.performance, t_wages.meal_supplement, t_wages.user_id, t_wages.user_name, t_wages.create_time,t_department.department_name,t_post.post_name FROM t_wages LEFT JOIN t_user ON t_wages.user_id = t_user.user_id LEFT JOIN t_department ON t_user.department_id = t_department.department_id LEFT JOIN t_post ON t_user.post_id = t_post.post_id
